channel.description: Recent content in home on Ole Brolin

item.title: About
item.description: Ole Brolin, born in Sweden 1988 Ole is a largely self-taught musician, artist and media technician. Ole has built installations and made sound designs for clients like the Ruhrtriennale, the Residenztheater in Munich, the Bruder-Grimm-Museum in Kassel and many others.
